thread.title: Nike’s Zoom Mercurial XI Flyknit Arrives in New Grey Colorway
thread.title_full: Nike’s Zoom Mercurial XI Flyknit Arrives in New Grey Colorway

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Nike’s Zoom Mercurial XI Flyknit Arrives in New Grey Colorway
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
In following up on the release of this Volt-accented pair , Nike has dropped off yet another new colorway of its Zoom Mercurial XI Flyknit .
The “Dark Grey” delivery in turn boasts dual shades of grey across the upper, while the heel is accented with supple brown leather. A white midsole then provides added contrast underneath, as tonal laces accompany the unique silhouette.
If you’re into the new grey Zoom Mercurial XI Flyknit from Nike, you can pick up your size today through select retailers.
